body.name: Retrotech R36S Handheld Video Game Console with Build-in 15000 Games (White)
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 39 mins
features: 🎮 RetroTech R36S Handheld Video Game Console: Enjoy classic games on the go with this handheld console featuring 15000 built-in games, including popular titles from the '90s.

🎮 Classic Games: The console features a wide variety of classic games, including action, adventure, sports, puzzle, and more. You can relive your childhood memories or discover new games you never played before.
🎮 Portable Design: The handheld console is lightweight and compact, making it easy to carry and play anywhere. Its ergonomic design ensures a comfortable grip, even during extended gaming sessions.
🎮 Rechargeable Battery: The console comes with a rechargeable battery that provides hours of gameplay on a single charge. You can easily recharge the battery using the included USB cable.
🎮 Ultra-compact size, it is very convenient whether you carry it with you during business trips, travel or camping. Play your favorite hames anytime, anywhere.
🎮 R36S Handheld console comes with 64GB TF Cards, USB-C Charge Cable, Screen Protector and Instructions.
body.description: 🎮 The Retrotech R36S Retro Handheld Video Game Console is a portable gaming device that allows you to enjoy classic video games on the go. It features a 3.5-inch IPS screen with a resolution of 640 x 480, and comes with built-in 15000 games. The console is powered by a rechargeable battery, and can be connected to a TV or monitor via an AV cable for a larger screen experience. The Retrotech R36S Retro Handheld Video Game Console is easy to use, with a simple menu system and intuitive controls. It also comes with a built-in game save feature, so you can save your progress and continue playing games later. Whether you're a nostalgia buff or a casual gamer, the Retrotech R36S Retro Handheld Video Game Console is a great choice for anyone who loves classic video games. Ultra-compact size, it is very convenient whether you carry it with you during business trips, travel or camping. Play your favorite hames anytime, anywhere. R36S Handheld console comes with 64GB TS Cards, USB-C Charge Cable, Screen Protector and Instructions. 🎮
